Class Competitor

java.lang.Object
main.Competitor
public class Competitor extends Object
Represents a competitor in a competition. Stores the competitor's ID, name, level, country, and scores.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Competitor(int competitorID, Name name, String level, String country, int[] scores)
    Constructs a Competitor object with all details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Competitor

      public Competitor(int competitorID, Name name, String level, String country, int[] scores)
      Constructs a Competitor object with all details.
      Parameters:
      competitorID - the unique ID of the competitor
      name - the Name object containing first and last names
      level - the competition level of the competitor
      country - the country of the competitor
      scores - an array of integer scores

  • Method Details

    • getCompetitorID

      public int getCompetitorID()
      Returns the competitor's ID.
      Returns:
      the competitor ID

    • getName

      public Name getName()
      Returns the Name object of the competitor.
      Returns:
      the competitor's name

    • getLevel

      public String getLevel()
      Returns the competition level of the competitor.
      Returns:
      the level

    • getCountry

      public String getCountry()
      Returns the country of the competitor.
      Returns:
      the country

    • getScoreArray

      public int[] getScoreArray()
      Returns an array of the competitor's scores.
      Returns:
      the scores array

    • getOverallScore

      public double getOverallScore()
      Calculates and returns the overall score. Only scores >= 0 are considered; -1 indicates not attempted.
      Returns:
      the average of valid scores as a double, or 0.0 if none

    • getFullDetails

      public String getFullDetails()
      Returns a string containing full details of the competitor, including ID, name, country, level, scores, and overall score. Scores not attempted are shown as "NA".
      Returns:
      a detailed string of all competitor information

    • getShortDetails

      public String getShortDetails()
      Returns a short string describing the competitor. Format includes competitor number, initials, and overall score.
      Returns:
      a concise string with competitor number, initials, and overall score

    • loadAllFromDB

      public static List<Competitor> loadAllFromDB()
      Loads all competitors from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of all Competitor objects; empty list if none
